name: Tingle's Balloon Fight DS
description:
Tingle's Balloon Fight DS is a special Nintendo DS version of the NES game, Balloon Fight, only available through the Japanese points program, Club Nintendo. It features the fairy-obsessed thirty-five year old man, Tingle, first seen in The Legend of Zelda: Majora's Mask, in the title role.

The game features three different modes of play:

1 Player Game: This mode takes place on two static screens. The goal is to defeat all of the enemies flying around on balloons without being killed yourself (either by the enemies or by drowning in the water below).

2-4 Players Game: This mode is a multiplayer version of the 1 Player Game. Up to four players can take part, using the download play feature of the Nintendo DS.

Balloon Trip: This mode takes place on two scrolling screens. In this mode, you must guide Tingle through the sky, dodging electric sparks and making sure that you don't fall into the water. Rupees are hanging from balloons in the air, and it's your job to collect as many as you can while you make your way through the level.

The game also features a gallery of pictures starring Tingle, which can be unlocked as you achieve secret goals throughout the game.

shot.caption: Opening animation - Ignoring aerial hazards and  liquid death to chase a rupee.
Green balloons are faster, and the bumper (red spheres on an axle) in the center  knocks anyone who touches it away.
The Balloon Trip mode. Traveling through a maze of electricity to collect as many rupees as possible.
Gaining points in different modes will allow Tingle to access more images in the narcissistic Tingle gallery!
Death by a thunder-ball shot from a cloud.
Plowing through enemy aeronauts. Hitting them after their balloons have been popped and they are drifting with their parachutes is worth extra points.
Downing a speedy green balloonist. The balloonist are rather primitive, a hot air balloon might be more sturdy - even an early Montgolfière.
Tingle gets a slight headstart, his opponents still have to inflate their balloons
Getting too close to the water is dangerous, this fish likes to eat nothing more than "fairies".
Between stages a mini-game occurs where rupee balloons come out of pipes. Letting none of them pass is worth a bonus!
Option screen, "???" will be revealed to be the Gallery Corner [?????????]
The fish can still get Tingle on his Balloon Trip. Finish, continue?
Perfect score on the mini-game! This is where the points really add up.
